title: Rewterz Threat Alert AveMaria RAT Active IOCs

sentences: AveMaria RAT is a remote access trojan that targets Windows systems that provides the capability to gain unauthorized access to a victims PC or allow covert surveillance of it. It acts as a keylogger, can steal passwords, escalate privileges, and much more. AveMaria, like most malware, first arrives at systems as a result of phishing mails (as invoices and shipping orders), but is also available on the dark web for subscriptions.
